EmailTemplate.name: Order Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for the order! Your order has been submitted and is estimated to ship in "xxx". A sales order acknowledgement will be emailed to the contact on file shortly, and an invoice including tracking information will be emailed upon shipment.
Order Number:
If you have any questions, please let us know.
We appreciate your order,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
